analyzed: namaḥ mañjuśriye kumāra bhūtāya
ācārya vasubandhu praṇītaḥ
tri svabhāva nirdeśaḥ tsn
kalpitaḥ paratantraḥ ca pariniṣpannaḥ eva ca
trayaḥ svabhāvāḥ dhīrāṇām gambhīra jñeyam iṣyate

original: yat khyāti paratantro 'sau yathā khyāti sa kalpitaḥ /
analyzed: yat khyāti paratantraḥ asau yathā khyāti sa kalpitaḥ
pratyaya adhīna vṛtti tvāt kalpanā mātra bhāvataḥ
tasya khyātuḥ yathā ākhyānam yā sadā avidyamāna tā
jñeyaḥ sa pariniṣpanna svabhāvaḥ ananyathātvataḥ

original: tatra kiṃ khyātyasatkalpaḥ kathaṃ khyāti dvayātmanā /
analyzed: tatra kim khyāti asat kalpaḥ katham khyāti dvaya ātmanā

original: tasya kā nāstitā tena yā tatrādvayadharmatā // Tsn_4 //
analyzed: tasya kā nāstitā tena yā tatra advaya dharma tā
asat kalpaḥ atra kaścid tam yatas tena hi kalpyate

original: yathā ca kalpayatyartha tathātyantaṃ na vidyate // Tsn_5 //
analyzed: yathā ca kalpayati artha tathā atyantam na vidyate
tad hetu phala bhāvena cittam dvividham iṣyate

original: yadālayākhyaṃ vijñānaṃ pravṛttyākhyaṃ ca saptadhā // Tsn_6 //
analyzed: yadā ālaya ākhyam vijñānam pravṛtti ākhyam ca saptadhā
saṃkleśa vāsanā bījaiḥ cita tvāt cittam ucyate
cittam ādyam dvitīyam tu citra ākāra pravṛttitaḥ
samāsatas abhūta kalpaḥ sa ca eṣa trividhaḥ mataḥ
vaipākikaḥ tathā naimittikaḥ anyaḥ prātibhāsikaḥ
prathamaḥ mūlavijñānam tad vipāka ātmakam yatas
anyaḥ pravṛtti vijñānam dṛśya dṛś vitti vṛttitaḥ
sat asat tvāt dvaya eka tvāt saṃkleśa vyavadānayoḥ
lakṣaṇā bhedataḥ ceṣṭā svabhāvānām gaṃbhīra tā
sattvena gṛhyate yasmāt atyanta abhāvaḥ eva ca
svabhāvaḥ kalpitaḥ tena sat asat lakṣaṇaḥ mataḥ
vidyate bhrānti bhāvena yathā ākhyānam na vidyate
paratantraḥ yatas tena sat asat lakṣaṇaḥ mataḥ
advaya tvena yat ca asti dvayasya abhāvaḥ eva ca
svabhāvaḥ tena niṣpannaḥ sat asat lakṣaṇaḥ mataḥ
dvaividhyāt kalpita arthasya tad asattva eka bhāvataḥ
svabhāvaḥ kalpitaḥ bālaiḥ dvaya eka tva ātmakaḥ mataḥ
prakhyānāt dvaya bhāvena bhrānti mātra eka bhāvataḥ
svabhāvaḥ paratantra ākhyaḥ dvaya eka tva ātmakaḥ mataḥ
dvaya abhāva svabhāva tvāt advaya eka svabhāvataḥ
svabhāvaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ dvaya eka tva ātmakaḥ mataḥ
kalpitaḥ paratantraḥ ca jñeyam saṃkleśa lakṣaṇam
pariniṣpannaḥ iṣṭaḥ tu vyavadānasya lakṣaṇam
asat dvaya svabhāva tvāt tad abhāva svabhāvataḥ
svabhāvāt kalpitāt jñeyaḥ niṣpannaḥ abhinna lakṣaṇaḥ
advaya tva svabhāva tvāt dvaya abhāva svabhāvataḥ
niṣpannāt kalpitaḥ ca eva vijñeyaḥ abhinna lakṣaṇaḥ
yathā ākhyānam asadbhāvāt tathā asattva svabhāvataḥ
svabhāvāt paratantra ākhyāt niṣpannaḥ abhinna lakṣaṇaḥ
asat dvaya svabhāva tvāt yathā ākhyāna asvabhāvataḥ
niṣpannāt paratantraḥ api vijñeyaḥ abhinna lakṣaṇaḥ
krama bhedaḥ svabhāvānām vyavahāra adhikārataḥ
tad praveśa adhikārāt ca vyutpatti artham vidhīyate
kalpitaḥ vyavahāra ātmā vyavahartṛ ātmakaḥ aparaḥ
vyavahāra samuccheda svabhāvaḥ ca anyaḥ iṣyate
dvaya abhāva ātmakaḥ pūrvam paratantraḥ praviśyate
tatas praviśyate tatra kalpa mātram asat dvayam
tatas dvaya abhāva bhāvaḥ niṣpannaḥ atra praviśyate

original: tathā hyasāveva tadā astināstīti cocyate // Tsn_25 //
analyzed: tathā hi asau eva tadā asti na asti iti ca ucyate
trayaḥ api ete svabhāvāḥ hi advaya ālamba lakṣaṇāḥ
abhāvāt atathābhāvāt tad abhāva svabhāvataḥ
māyā kṛtam mantra vaśāt khyāti hasti ātmanā yathā

original: ākāramātraṃ tatrāsti hastī nāsti tu sarvathā // Tsn_27 //
analyzed: ākāra mātram tatra asti hastī nā asti tu sarvathā
svabhāvaḥ kalpitaḥ hastī paratantraḥ tad ākṛtiḥ
yaḥ tatra hasti abhāvaḥ asau pariniṣpannaḥ iṣyate
asat kalpaḥ tathā khyāti mūlacittāt dvaya ātmanā
dvayam atyantataḥ nā asti tatra asti ākṛti mātrakam
mantra vat mūla vijñānam kāṣṭha vat tathatā matā
hasti ākāra vat eṣṭavyaḥ vikalpaḥ hasti vat dvayam
artha tattva prativedhe yugapad lakṣaṇa trayam

original: parijñā ca prahāṇaṃ ca prāptiśceṣṭā yathākramam // Tsn_31 //
analyzed: parijñā ca prahāṇam ca prāptiḥ ca iṣṭāḥ yathākramam
parijñā anupalambhaḥ atra hāniḥ akhyānam iṣyate

original: upalambhanimittā tu prāptiḥ sākṣātkriyāpi sā // Tsn_32 //
analyzed: upalambha nimittā tu prāptiḥ sākṣātkriyā api sā
dvayasya anupalambhena dvaya ākāraḥ vigacchati
vigamāt tasya niṣpannaḥ dvaya abhāvaḥ adhigamyate
hastinaḥ anupalambhaḥ ca vigamaḥ ca tad ākṛteḥ

original: upalambhaśca kāṣṭhasya māyāyāṃ yugapad yathā // Tsn_34 //
analyzed: upalambhaḥ ca kāṣṭhasya māyāyām yugapad yathā
viruddha dhī vāraṇa tvāt buddhyāḥ vaiyarthya darśanāt
jñāna traya anuvṛtteḥ ca mokṣa āpattiḥ ayatnataḥ
citta mātra upalambhena jñeya artha anupalambha tā
jñeya artha anupalambhena syāt citta anupalambha tā
dvayoḥ anupalambhena dharmadhātu upalabhbha tā
dharmadhātu upalambhena syāt vibhu tva upalambha tā
upalabdha vibhu tvaḥ ca sva para artha prasiddhitaḥ
prāpnoti anuttarām bodhim dhīmān kāya traya ātmikām
iti tri svabhāva nirdeśaḥ samāptaḥ
kṛtiḥ ācārya vasubandhu pādānām iti
